name: DESTRUCTURE - Build & Destroy
blurb: Build & Destroy to take over the world! This is a Mobile game where you challenge other players to DESTRUCTURE battles.

rewards.reward: THANKS. We are forever grateful!\r\n============================= You will get 500 Game Points - A $9.95 dlls value\r\n__________________________________ Plus a HD DESTRUCTURE Wallpaper
